meanings.sent1: I made a wager with my friend on who would win the game.
meanings.sent2: He placed a wager on the horse race.
meanings.sent3: The wager between the two siblings added excitement to their day.
meanings.sent4: Life is like a wager, sometimes you win and sometimes you lose.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the wager chips made the game more fun.

meanings.definition: To risk something on the outcome of an event.
meanings.sent1: She decided to wager her allowance on the basketball game.
meanings.sent2: Players often wager money on card games.
meanings.sent3: I wouldn't wager my lunch on that bet!
meanings.sent4: He chose to wager his reputation on the success of the project.
meanings.sent5: The explorers had to wager their safety for a chance to discover new lands.

meanings.sent1: I like to wager on the outcome of sports matches.
meanings.sent2: Friends often wager small amounts on friendly games.
meanings.sent3: She decided to wager her dessert on the trivia question.
meanings.sent4: He would often wager his lucky coin for a chance to win big.
meanings.sent5: The group of friends would wager on who could finish their food first.
